https://tmrev.io/movie/641363-15 Minutes of Shame 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lQrJOZbNUrzJLwXqPUKqZGJ5NoC.jpg Monica Lewinsky and filmmaker Max Joseph (Catfish) examine the human price of public shaming and cyber-harassment, profiling people who have experienced them first-hand - while investigating the bullies, bystanders, and experts in between. 15 Minutes of Shame
